-- Invoke webhook to get weather
local key = "SUq5h0SdD1cXXwnFpwCEbu6YYgtuiMfe"
local hook = "https://api.giphy.com/v1/gifs/random?api_key="..key
local data = Invoke.webhook(hook, 'GET', '')


-- Parse json response for URL


local url = data.bitly_url.text


-- Variables as strings, and set in the context


Context.set('url', tostring(url))


-- Branch to next step

Workflow.branch(136)
